compatibility.notes: This license is copyleft-weak, meaning it allows modifications and derivative works to be distributed under a different license.

key_requirements: You must make at least one of the following: place your modifications in the Public Domain, make them Freely Available, use the modified Package only within your corporation or organization, rename non-standard executables and provide a separate manual page for each non-standard executable that clearly documents how it differs from the Standard Version.
license.name: Artistic-1.0
obligations: Insert a prominent notice in each changed file stating how and when you changed that file.

Make your modifications Freely Available, such as by posting said modifications to Usenet or an equivalent medium, or placing the modifications on a major archive site such as ftp.uu.net, or by allowing the Copyright Holder to include your modifications in the Standard Version of the Package.
